channel.title: Command help
channel.description: my source is pimpscape and when i try to make a command and enter the id and amount it wont give me the right amount it will only give me one

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Frosty, make a new thread, and put your message… more… English-er ?

When making a command to add stuff, unless it is noted, you can’t add multiple un-noted items.
Repeat the code how ever many times you want

Ex>

  1. Wrong: else if(command.startsWith("food")){ addItem(392,10); }
  2. Correct: else if(command.startsWith("food')){ addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); addItem(392,1); }

Post back if theres any problems.

Read full topic
